title: So theres this guy...
body: So as you can guess i will be talking about another person and not me! This person has started LoL this season and he managed to finish his provisionals just a week before preseason. He was placed in Bronze 2 but then when i checked his account about 5-7 days later he was Silver 5!! Now he is Silver 3!! I cant believe a person with that much inexperience ( and no he isn't a smurf, i know him in person). Can someone explain to me why some people which such inexperience can climb the ladder with ease. and to be honest I'm not a good climber

replies.body: He's probably a fast learner who can take on the game easily or has experience from other mobas,  e.g Me, I've played dota ands smite for years and i switched to league, I'm gold 5 now and my friend who's played for 3 years is still bronze

> [{quoted}](name=ScrubCloud,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=FwNtALP5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-11-24T22:25:07.649+0000)
>
> He's probably a fast learner who can take on the game easily or has experience from other mobas,  e.g Me, I've played dota ands smite for years and i switched to league, I'm gold 5 now and my friend who's played for 3 years is still bronze

Yeah hes probably just good
He might just be better than you.

maybe he got lucky in ranked, maybe he played passive in all those games and didnt feed, chance of winning is higher if you dont feed ^.>{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

Some games you don't have to make any fancy plays all you have to do is farm and do your role in a teamfight/split
I know this is gonna seem completely crazy and absolutely absurd. Please no hate for this outrageous comment but.... what if he's.... you know..... kinda just..... **good?**
maybe he played some similar games in the past. Or he is just a fast learner
